hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Beta Compression in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes (confidence > 60%), when BTC's 20-day rolling volatility drops below 40% and the median 30-day correlation of top 10 altcoins (excluding ETH) to BTC falls below 0.65, a long position in the 3 altcoins with the lowest correlation that simultaneously show positive 5-day price momentum will generate alpha over the next 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral/low-volatility regimes, altcoin correlations to BTC tend to compress. Altcoins that have decoupled while maintaining positive momentum may be early leaders in a rotational move. The low correlation provides diversification, while positive momentum suggests underlying strength not tied to BTC direction.
entry_conditions: Median 30-day altcoin-BTC correlation (top 10 by market cap, excl. ETH) < 0.65
Select 3 altcoins with lowest 30-day BTC correlation AND 5-day return > 0%
Equal weight portfolio entry at market open following signal

exit_conditions.time_exit: 10 trading days after entry (close of day 10)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Strategy fails if the low-correlation altcoin portfolio underperforms an equal-weighted altcoin basket by >3% over the 10-day period in more than 45% of historical neutral regime occurrences.
